/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The buildings, painted in shades of gray and white, rise high into the sky, their glass windows reflecting the sunlight. The street below is a hive of activity, lined with trees that provide a touch of greenery amidst the urban landscape. People can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, adding a human element to the scene. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, ready to whisk their owners away at a moment's notice. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
